Room.Name: The Red Dragon Tavern
Room.ShortDescription: The Red Dragon Tavern is perhaps the most popular place to visit in Kista.
Room.LongDescription: The tavern is well kept by Kaliv and Crystal, who have claimed (while under the influence) that they have single-handedly killed a red dragon after it had burned off all their armor and melted their weapons. They claim to have used their last remaining magic spells to finally subdue the dragon.
